docs: th effrontery desk staff were pleasant on arrival and departure .my lungs were on fire the night clerk ( some guy ) could not have cared less about the issue , i had to sleep in the car .i called the next day and spoke with the young lady who checked me in and told her i was calling them on their 100 % guarantee .she said she would take care of it .i got the bill , but not the refund . </DOC> the front desk was very friendly , including the manager who was there , but it became very clear after a few minutes that they have no idea how to handle a customer who checks in on - line and chooses his own room .front desk gave me another room and said to each other " we need to find out who is actually in that room ? " checked my bill closely and will watch my credit card statement , but it did n't give me a lot of confidence .wasted a lot of time just checking in and going back and forth trying to get a room , that i 'd already chosen and checked in to .did n't get the room i picked obviously and was put on the opposite side of the hotel , so that was also a waste of my time as well .the staff greeted us with smiles , and got us checked in very quickly . </DOC> and the breakfast buffet was really good , too , with delicious hot foods and a nice spread of fresh fruit , muffins , yogurts , and cereals .the " hot " food was old and when it did run out ( others ate it ... ! ) , they were very slow to replenish .pool was closed due to an incident during our stay .the hotel , right off the highway provided friendly easy to work with staff who were knowledgable about the area .we were impressed with the evening front desk staff on the night we arrived . </DOC> the staff there is helpful and friendly .amanda and hayley were very pleasant and a joy to meet . </DOC> the food was slightly over priced for my taste but kids got ice cream with each kids meal .fortunately , the front desk helped me book the last room , a whirlpool suite roomthen on friday night , the awesome front desk staff upgraded me to the same room , so i was using fewer points , but i did n't have to change rooms .both of the front desk staff members were very pleasant and helpful even though i 'the breakfast is dependable . </DOC> front desk staff was great at check in andrestaurant staff was good as well .it was almost always too cold or too warm .on the brighter side , the staff was unfailingly pleasant and helpful .if you 're trying to be responsible and get an uber ... good luck . </DOC> the only thing that stood out was the friendliness of the staff .the staff was friendly .that was nice and normal for a hampton inn which we appreciate very much .and you can hear every word of the people in the next room having a normal conversation .on the plus side , all of the staff were friendly and the parking lot is huge . </DOC> front desk staff were very good , and free internet excellent .the front desk personnel greeted us warmly , advised us they had a few rooms remaining and worked hard to get us the best rate possible .front desk staff is polite and efficient .the staff were what i call civil - friendly .i have found this to be a common charactoristic of hampton employees .
summary: the front desk staff was very nice and helpful .it is a pleasant hotel with a great staff who were friendly and efficient .the staff was very friendly .i was greeted by the most friendly staff i met , and the staff were all very helpful .</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
